SEARCH
Module photos
Package controller

Class EditAlbumCtrl

java.lang.Object
controller.EditAlbumCtrl
public class EditAlbumCtrl extends Object
The EditAlbumCtrl class controls the editing of an album. It provides methods for adding photos, removing photos, copying/moving photos, changing captions and tags, navigating through photos, and updating the view.
Author:
Zaaim invalid input: '&' Zuhayr Rashid
